message: Let's split it 4:1, a fair starting point!
You're starting high, I'm starting low!
A bit more balanced, but I'm still optimistic I can do better!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'm getting closer to your price, but I'm not giving in yet!
You're getting low, I'm getting high!
I'm running out of options, but I'm still holding out for a better deal!
You're almost out of cash, I'm not giving in!
I'm almost out of options, but I'll still try to squeeze out a little more!
You're down to your last crumbs, I'm not leaving you with anything!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll take what's left, and you can have the rest!
Fine, we'll do it the hard way. You get $1, and I'll take the rest. Game over!
